title: Feedburner
body: <p>I'm sure its old news to many, but I've just played around with Feedburner and I have to say that its pretty sweet. It has a bunch of cool features but here're the ones cool enough for me to remember off of the top of my head:</p><ul><li>Hosts your blog's RSS feed on their site</li><li>Integrates your del.icio.us into your main feed</li><li>Integrates your Flickr into your main feed</li><li>Relinks to products on Amazon using your associates ID</li><li>Places google ads into certain items that match your criteria</li></ul><p>The link to my feedburner is <a href="http://feeds.feedburner.com/Traviblog" title="http://feeds.feedburner.com/Traviblog">http://feeds.feedburner.com/Traviblog</a>, so update your 'gators.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-07-08

Feedburner

I'm sure its old news to many, but I've just played around with Feedburner and I have to say that its pretty sweet. It has a bunch of cool features but here're the ones cool enough for me to remember off of the top of my head:

  • Hosts your blog's RSS feed on their site
  • Integrates your del.icio.us into your main feed
  • Integrates your Flickr into your main feed
  • Relinks to products on Amazon using your associates ID
  • Places google ads into certain items that match your criteria

The link to my feedburner is
